page.title: 03Diary 2
page.content: Sarah Lawrence I get up at 7.00am with just my brother to play with.Then we have breakfast we have cereal or a piece of bread.Afterwards we go to get the sheep in for shearing.There is country all around not a house in sight just us the animals and the Tors.We start the shearing about 10.00am.Then we have dinner.After dinner we finish the shearing.We often go for a walk in the fields and see such things as buzzards and rabbits sometimes the odd fox.Then we help Mum with the house or go riding.Then we have tea.After tea Dad puts the generator on so we can watch tv for 2 hours.We have no electricity because we are in an isolated place.
